attributes.action: Deport ALL foreign Terrorists regardless of their human rights
attributes.additional_details:
The undersigned call for all foreign terrorists to be departed from the UK. We call for either the UK government to put the human rights before these terrorists or go back to the EU and remove the barrier that allow foreigh terrorists to stay in the UK.

We recognise that this would make our land for the law abiding citizens safer and put their human rights higher than the terrosrists but also make the UK safer as well as we will not have to pay for the wage bill of watching these terrorists if they do remain in the UK.
